description: A group of technologically advanced, hostile beings that emerged from underground fissures, initiating a war for control of the Earth.
Characterized by their monstrous silhouettes and fluid, coordinated movements, they wield advanced weaponry and possess a predatory gaze.
Their origins remain mysterious, but their presence marks the beginning of an era of darkness and brutal conflict.
events: The First Incursion - The initial emergence of the Subterraneans on September 5th, 2027, at 12:54 PM.
The city streets became battlegrounds as the Subterraneans tore through concrete and soil, emerging from glowing chasms.
The Subterraneans' coordinated assault marked the dawn of a war for the planet, with their advanced weaponry causing widespread destruction.
Engaged in brutal confrontations with human survivors, showcasing advanced physical capabilities and resilience.
Utilized weapons that spat incandescent energy, turning fleeing civilians into bursts of ash and steam.
